name: wifsimster-resume
description: Immersive WebGL resume for Damien Battistella (Wifsimster)
author: Damien Battistella <wifsimster@github.com>

scripts.docker:build: docker build --build-arg VERSION=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --build-arg BUILD_DATE=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ) --build-arg VCS_REF=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) -t wifsimster/resume:latest -t wifsimster/resume:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") .
scripts.docker:tag: docker tag wifsimster/resume:latest wifsimster/resume:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version.split('.').slice(0,2).join('.')") && docker tag wifsimster/resume:latest wifsimster/resume:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version.split('.')[0]")
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run docker:build && npm run docker:tag && npm run docker:push
